text: Välkommen Hero is a 1986 studio album by Freda', released on vinyl, cassette tape. and CD. In 1993, the album was rerelased to CD. == Track listing == Lyrics and music: Uno Svenningsson & Arne Johansson. # Ingen kan förklara # En dag till # Välkommen Hero # Ljusa sidan # Vi formas och vi lär # Doktorn # Vindarna # Ännu en svala # Somnar in # Drömmen är min 1993 CD edition bonus tracks (1993): # * Sanningens magi # På tiden att vi träffas # Ta min plats == Contributors (Freda') == *Uno Svenningsson - vocals, guitar, choir *Arne Johansson - guitar, synthesizer, programming, choir *Sam Johansson - synth, organ, choir *Mats Johansson - drums, percussion and synthesizer == Other musicians == *Dan Sundquist - programmering, synthesizer, choir *Lars Danielsson - electric bass, double bass (1, 2, 3 and 8) *Jerry Walfridsson - bass (4, 5 and 6) *Per Nordbring - drums (7 and 10) *Jan Nordbring - bass (7 and 10) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (1988) !Peak position |- |} == References == Category:1986 albums Category:Freda' albums Category:Swedish-language albums
title: Välkommen Hero
